response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its value to you, we believe it would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a high-quality item at a competitive rate, considering its worth to you is $10,000. Should you decide to proceed, please let us know, and we will arrange for immediate delivery. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
